However, there is no reference to either Pennsylvania State University (Option A) or Virginia Tech (Option B) in the response. It seems they bring up another, separate point by talking about Rutgers. They take about their son’s feeling that Rutgers would be ‘an extension of high school,’ – which also doesn’t have direct relevance to the options in question. There are generalities about the advantages of looking at schools outside the area, using aid offered as criteria but again no preference between Pennsylvania State University and Virginia Tech is mentioned.
